name: Liminal Lab 000
description:
Liminal Lab 000

Liminal Lab 000 is a minimal 1-puzzle puzzle game with full audio, sound effects, collision detection, Minecraft-style voxel rendering, and position-based partial block tinting to make like-textured blocks look better together.

Solve the included puzzle by stepping on the floor buttons in the right sequence. When all the wall lights are lit up, the door will open!
